item.title: Dual Core, Quad Core, Up to 64 Core Managed Dedicated Servers
item.description:
The race for faster processors has shifted its focus. Instead of increasing clock speeds, the industry is now prioritizing multi-core and multi-processor designs to improve performance. The good news is that there are affordable options for powerful processing, including managed dedicated servers with excellent support. Entry-level systems typically feature dual-core processors. For increased power, users can opt for quad-core or hexa-core (6 cores) configurations. For even greater performance, dual or quad-processor dedicated servers are available...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/dual-core-quad-core-up-to-64-core-managed-dedicated-servers/
